name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\OskSupport.dll) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\system32\\DllHost.exe AND file.path:C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Media\ Player\\osk.exe))`
